Name: Kawah Putih or Bandung White Crater
Description: Absolutely in the top of the list of Bandung interesting places for its stunningly lovely lake as if set out of a movie. It is 2 hours far from Bandung city center and in the Highland, but it deserves to do. The place is cooling, however, beware of sunburn as it is still actually bright here without feeling it. This is a sulphuric lake as it originates from a volcano. The entire location can be explored in 30 minutes.

Name: Tangkuban Perahu
Description: Tangkuban Perahu is about 1 hour and 30 minutes from Bandung and still be favored by the tourist to visit this lovely website in Bandung, it is yet another crater from a volcano in Indonesia that deserves the go to for the vast awe of the view from the top. This might be 2nd finest to Kawah Putih however still worth to go to.

Name: Dusun Bambu
Description: A relaxing household leisure park at the foot of the mountain with very motivating, superb and remarkable attractive surroundings. Massive bamboo structure welcomes you at the main gate, and a fancy-dancy flower shuttle bus will bring you to the primary area of the park.

Name: Saung Angklung Udjo Show
Description: Saung Angklung Udjo Show is the best places to visit in Bandung. Even with eyes closed, merely hearing the happy tinkling tunes of the Angklung will put a smile on your face. Angklung is a conventional musical instrument made from bamboo.

Name: Ciater Hot Spring
Description: About 30 km from Bandung city, near Lembang, you will see a hot spring that originates from the existing crater of Tangkuban Perahu Mountain. You can take pleasure in hot water by getting a bath. During the journey to the hot spring, you will fulfill the surroundings of greenish tea gardens.

Name: YELLO Hotel Paskal Bandung
Description: Welcoming guests with its chic design and contemporary artworks, YELLO Hotel Paskal Bandung offers urban-style accommodation with an on-site restaurant and an outdoor pool. This 3-star hotel has a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.Designed in bright colours, the rooms at the hotel come with a flat-screen TV and air conditioning. The private bathrooms are fitted with showers and free amenities. Guests can make use of the desk and the seating area in the room, or play fun games in the common game lounge.A buffet breakfast is available daily at YELLO Hotel Paskal Bandung.Pasar Baru Bandung is 1 km from YELLO Hotel Paskal Bandung, while Braga City Walk is 1.5 km away. Husein Sastranegara Airport is 3 km from the property.

Name: Aryaduta Bandung
Description: One of our top picks in Bandung.  Hotel Aryaduta Bandung offers 5-star accommodation in the heart of Bandung, just 5 minutes' drive from all the major factory outlets and the quaint Braga Street area. The hotel has a walkway connected to Bandung Indah Plaza Mall. An outdoor pool, fitness centre and pampering spa services are available. Free WiFi access is provided in all areas.Rooms are fitted with carpeted flooring and decorated in neutral colours. A flat-screen cable/satellite TV, minibar and personal safe are included. En suite bathrooms come with hot-water showers and slippers.Hotel Aryaduta Bandung is a 10-minute walk from St. Hall Railway Station and a 45-minute drive from Tangkuban Perahu Crater. Free parking is available. Husein Sastranegara International Airport is a 20-minute drive away.A 24-hour front desk and 24-hour room service are provided for guests' convenience.Taruma Kafe serves a daily buffet breakfast, as well as international and Continental dishes. Other dining options include Cantonese cuisine at Cha Yuen Chinese Restaurant and freshly bakes pastries and bread at Cinnamon Pastry Boutique. Further dining options can be found within a 10-minute drive.

Name: The Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung
Description: One of our top picks in Bandung.  Located in the integrated Trans Studio Bandung Complex, The Trans Luxury Hotel Bandung offers modern rooms fitted with an iPod dock. The hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a spa centre and a 24-hour fitness centre. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the building.Bandung’s Trans Luxury Hotel is situated a 30-minute drive from Husein Sastranegara International Airport. Tangkuban Perahu Volcano is a 1-hour drive away.Each room comes fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV and tea/coffee-making facilities. Free toiletries and a hairdryer are provided. A large seating area with a sofa is provided.Guests can enjoy a work out in the fitness centre or head for a relaxing massage to unwind. The hotel has a concierge desk to assist guests with their requests. Laundry and ironing services are available. Airport transfer can be arranged for a fee.A selection of Asian and western dishes are served in the hotel’s restaurant. The hotel also has a restaurant serving international dishes.
